field.description: Enter the IP address or hostname to which the traceroute will be performed.
The number of pings to send. Each ping takes 1 second.

field.sethelp: Forces MTR to display numeric IP addresses and disables reverse DNS resolution of host names.

field.description: Display both host names and IP addresses.
field.sethelp: Forces MTR to display both the host names resolved from DNS and numeric IP addresses.
Forces MTR to output the data without formatting, to store results for later analysis or parsing by an external program.
